title: (x) Asprey London logo stressed sans - custom logo by Julian Morey {Nick Cooke}
content:
[http://www.asprey.com/images/logo\_big.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007164510/http:/www.asprey.com/images/logo_big.gif "http://www.asprey.com/images/logo\_big.gif")

Will someone please id the typeface used for the Aprey text? Thanks.

 [‹ Chiche Cherro Restaurante Kosher hand printed caps](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007164510/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39865 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) The Blue Moon Restaurant logo - University Roman {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007164510/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39840 "Go to next forum topic")
author: elabdesigns

comments.content: Custom logo inspired by Optima, methinks.

I seem to remember that Julian Morey did it, but can find no proof for this.

Nick Cooke
Yes it is Julian Morey, see his site at [http://www.abc-xyz.co.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007164510/http:/www.abc-xyz.co.uk/ "http://www.abc-xyz.co.uk/") it has pictures of this work
